text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } long int c [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) c [ i ] = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { c [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } if ( a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] < a [ n - 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) c [ j ] += a [ n - 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; else c [ j ] += a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( c [ i ] <= c [ i + 1 ] ) c [ i ] = c [ i + 1 ] ; else c [ i + 1 ] = c [ i ] ; } printf ( "\n%ld" , c [ n - 2 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
